verbose_text: As important members of the TGF-beta signal transduction system, Smad proteins directly transport signals from the cell membrane to the nucleus, and mediate intracellular TGF-beta signal transduction regulating cell proliferation, transformation, synthesis, secretion and apoptosis.
evidence: Smad proteins directly transport signals from the cell membrane to the nucleus, and mediate intracellular TGF-beta signal transduction
